20@2.body:
Running off a USB drive, results aren't great:

Benchmarking ZeroNet 0.3.0 (rev193) Python 2.7.9 (default, Dec 10 2014, 12:24:55) [MSC v.1500 32 bit (Intel)], platform: win32...

CryptBitcoin:
- hdPrivatekey x 10..........0.506s [x1.38: Fine]
- sign x 10..........0.235s [x1.49: Fine]

- pure-python verify x 10..........0.942s [x1.70: Fine]

CryptHash:
- sha512 x 10 000..........0.499s [x2.00: Fast]

Db:
- Open x 10..........0.153s [x0.85: OK]
- Insert x 10 x 1000..........2.035s [x0.49: Ehh]
- Buffered insert x 100 x 100..........7.922s [x0.16: Sloooow]
- Total rows in db: 20000
- Indexed query x 1000..........0.530s [x0.47: Ehh]
- Not indexed query x 100..........0.463s [x1.30: Fine]
- Like query x 100..........2.193s [x0.82: OK]
